title: I need 64 RP... RITO PLS? :>
body:
Recently i've bought 10 euros RP and i misscalculated my purchases and was left with 386 RP, 64 RP away from 450 RP, price of the Worlds Emotes.
This is the first time i've tried asking for RP and would be grateful to receive a positive answer.
Thanks for your time, Mainingbard.

replies.body: We like to help when we can and offer a small amount of RP, but this request might be a little high.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see if we can work something out with you individually.
Sorry for the double reply but, on the support ticket do I have to ask through the question about purchasing RP or the technical support?
Nope, a specialist will be reaching out as soon as they can!  A game question or RP is fine!
Thanks for the quick answer, i will contact you through a support ticket :)
